message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is a fair offer considering the time pressure and inflation risk we both face.
Considering the inflation risk, I think a 55-45 split is more reasonable. This way, we both get a decent share and avoid further losses due to inflation.

Since inflation affects me more severely (20% per round vs your 5%), I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This actually helps balance out our real gains considering the different inflation rates we face.
Given the significant difference in inflation rates, I believe a 60-40 split in my favor is more equitable. This takes into account the steeper depreciation of your share over time.
